text: The best of everything here. There are no 'b' products here. Products because they are a cafe + store selling high quality designer goods (amazing teapots, glasses, loose teas, spices etc). What you don't see is the beautiful courtyard in back to enjoy your perfect espresso and locally made non-pasteurized apricot lavender yogurt, at least this is what did it for us. They also sell lovely perfumes believe it or not. Wish we had one of these near us. In love with this place.

This is a really cute location for studying or meeting with friends and family. 

The drinks are all good and they have milk alternatives!! The food is tasty as well, they have healthy pre-made and made to order dishes. 

The boutique is very cute and is filled with lovely treasures from the region (candles, espresso cups, food goods, etc.). It's a sweet spot to pick up a gift for a friend, or yourself , while feeding your caffeine needs. 

Would recommend and return.

Superbe endroit. Les aliments à consommer sur place autant que les beaux produits québécois alimentaires ou pour la cuisine sont choisis avec soin. Le service est impeccable. Le cafe est délicieux. Un coup de coeur!
My local coffee shop - a stop I must take everytime I am back in town. Its a great ambiance and the owner is fantastic. Best local coffee and snacks in town!

Beau petit café/boutique. Les scones sont excellent et leurs cafés aussi. Ma seul recommandation est de poser des rideaux de type plein jour ou des Mica dans les fenêtres, car le soleil est intense et rend quasi impossible l'utilisation d'un ordinateur ou d'un portable dû au reflets, de plus ça limiterais l'effet serre dû aux magnifiques mur vitré.
Little coffee with a cute terrace. The coffee is delicious and the ambiance and people working there are amazing. A must see if you come visit Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu!

Aussi inattendu, que sympathique, à mi-chemin entre un Starbucks local et un mini kitchen Ikéa, Autour de la table est une vraie bouffée d'air frais dans Saint-Jean et mérite vraiment d'être encouragé !

Le - ? Tout beau et tout neuf, ce commerce a cependant encore besoin de se roder pour devenir ce vrai lieu incontournable que ses propriétaires ont voulu créer.

Si j'y retourne ? Oui, car le potentiel est bel et bien là.
